about_the_game:
Do you have a keen eye for cleanliness? Do you consider yourself an enemy of mud and grime? Do you take pride in ensuring every crevasse and cranny shimmers and sparkles? Then this is the job for you!

Enjoy a casual working environment where you'll get the chance to serve our beloved clientele. You'll be washing away mud, scrubbing out gunk and grime, and bubbling up to all our patrons--making sure they're satisfied!

Be sure to FOLLOW OUR PATREON FOR ALL EARLY CONTENT patreon(dot)com/bathhousesimulator

Mud and grime aren't going to wash away by magic, it takes a little elbow grease! As a new recruit, we won't burden you with too challenging of cleans, but if you're up for the task then you'll want to be sure to upgrade your brushes, hoses, soaps, nozzles, and more to complete even the toughest cleans. 

But that's not all, your responsibilities may also include:

  • Managing Client Relations (It's important to us that our clientele feels welcomed and appreciated!) 

  • Keeping all your Rooms Occupied and in Optimal Standing

  • Managing Water Temperatures so all guest are as comfortable as possible 

  • Helping expand and improve the bath house's reputation and scale! We're an ever growing business and we expect new recruits to be excited about development!

The bath house has a wide variety of clientele to clean, ranging from General Guests, to Gore Covered Warriors and Polluted Spirits needing a helping hand. Each wash is meant to be both challenging, but also relaxing. Bask in the views, soak in sweet sounds, and unwind while you ensure every guest leaves feeling satisfied. 

Scratch your itch of washing something while also enjoying our mud physics that produce pleasing dripping, clumping, and blobbing effects to simulate washing away actual mud!

Expanding the bath house, and building custom rooms, is a soon to be feature as well. This will include Room Decoration, and Room Management, where you'll be responsible for more than just your washes. 

Along with that, more mini-games will be introduced to add to the atmosphere of working in a spirited bath house. 

As features roll out, you can expect to encounter more Unlockable Guests, Unlockable Rooms, and Unlockable Assets such as Attires, Skins, Collector's Graphics, Steam Achievements, and Game Awards. 

We hope you enjoy your time in the bath house and don't be afraid to get wet!

content_descriptors.notes:
Some clientele of the bath house come with the option to remove clothing, though this is not required. Removing clothing does result in nudity. 

Game Clientele will respond with a variety of different poses/animations based on what tools are used on different parts of their bodies. These animations may come across as sexualized.

Players may be awarded Mature content in the game such as, interactive sex/masturbation scenes, lewd character graphics and splash art, and erotic content that portrays characters in a Mature way.

name: Bath House Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen Series 7 5800x
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a working bath house, where you're responsible for cleaning all clients ranging from Spirits to Warriors and General Guests. Using and upgrading a variety of tools, you're responsible for making sure every client leaves feeling fresh and cleaned of all mud, grime, and gunk!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
